TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Charles_Barkley, title = Charles_Barkley, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Barkley} }

S.FORM: siwkay ni Charles Barkley ci Charles Barkley nalecuh i Leeds, Alabama, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Charles Barkley i 1984 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 5, namapili' tu nu Philadelphia 76ers putiput. ci Charles Barkley nalecuhan i 2 a bulad 20 a demiad, 1963 a mihca. ci Charles Barkley, miunduay. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
